title: Appellate court confirms DeSantis-backed voting law in Florida
Appellate court confirms DeSantis-backed voting law in Florida

sentence: Governor Ron DeSantis, who is running for re-election and is considered a top Republican contender for the 2024 presidential election, signed the bill into law last year after it passed the Republican-majority legislature.
author: Joseph Ax
title: U.S. appeals court reinstates Florida voting limits that judge had deemed discriminatory

author: Adam Schrader
title: Appeals court temporarily reinstates Florida voting law

author: Adam Schrader
